divs: Sighting Details Driving home on the 5 freeway I noticed Over the eastern hills of San Jaun Capistrano hills 8-10 balls of ice blue light that seemed not to cast a light shadow where moving in an strange manor, gettting smaller, then larger, further away diaspearing then re apearing larger then smaller then 3 of them formed a face up triangle, then in a micro second they were gone! This all took place near the TRW plant behind the eastern San Juan area! The thing I noticed was that the lights almost looked incased, light was emitted, but it looked like in stayed inside of something, the lights where so different in color I have never seen a more brillant Ice white blue in my life, it realy seemed out of this world! I have no explination for what I saw!
Summary: 8 to10 ice blue objects moving in a strange way growing larger and smaller
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in San Juan Capistrano
There were no other sightings in San Juan Capistrano on or around February 13th 2006
